entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Colville Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
